00023 Symbol* SymbolTable::find( const string& name )
00024 {
00025    map<string, Symbol>::iterator p = table.begin();
00026    while( p != table.end() )
00027      {
00028        if( p->second.name == name || p->second.synonym == name )
00029      return &(p->second);
00030        p++;
00031      }
00032    
00033    return NULL;
00034 }

00075 Symbol* SymbolTable::insertLabel( const string& label, 
00076                   const string& alias, 
00077                   const valarray<int>& N )
00078 {
00079    Symbol a = Symbol::createLabel( label, alias, N );
00080    table[ label ] = a;
